explains: adj. 虔诚的；敬神的；可嘉的；尽责的

sentences.en: He was brought up by pious female relatives.
sentences.cn: 他是由虔诚的女性亲属抚养大的。

sentences.en: Catherine was a pious, earnest woman.
sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳是位虔诚、真挚的女子。

sentences.en: Such reforms seem likely to remain little more than pious hopes.
sentences.cn: 这类改革可能只是画饼充饥而已。
